Content.Text: TCU Server has been updated to 1.2.0.0
Sorry for the delay, but we got a whole heap of fixes for you this time!
▸ Fixed a real nasty bug that would sometimes reset your savegame when erroring to the title screen (including the #0_24 error when losing connection).
▸ Fixed Award License Plates not being awarded (retroactive).
▸ Fixed the CAU-Mode Smart Loot not giving out Part rewards when your car is at a high level (Faction Missions, Summits, CAU Crates)
▸ Fixed Summit Events erroring you back to the title screen.
▸ Fixed CAU Crates giving a Perf spec Nissan 370z instead of a Fullstock one.
▸ Fixed CAU Crates missing Ford Mustang GT 2011 from the loot table.
▸ Corrected Smart Loot behavior - it will now calculate part rewards based on your current equipped parts per slot, instead of your best owned part per slot.
▸ Fixed Faction Mission "Showtime" not rewarding Bucks/XP.
We would like to sincerely apologize to everyone who lost their saves to the #0_24 error :(

On a brighter note, the TCU community's modding efforts in the last weeks have been seriously prolific and impressive. We will make a dedicated post about modding soon. For now, go ahead and check out the modding section on the TCU Discord!
